Merge pull request #83 from freerider7777/patch-2

Support for emulated cards SAK (0x28).
Updated URLs to mfoc/mfcuk & one cosmetic code change.

Added more well known keys to the extended key file.

Remove the old and restart MCT to get the new key file.
Separated the list of incompatible devices from the readme.
Check the BCC value before writing to block 0.
Added notes regarding the BCC value.
Fixed readme.
Bugfix: MCT now works properly again on devices without NFC.
Updated build tools and gradle version.
Added bare bone of the 'BCC Calculator'.
Added layout and implemented BCC calculator functionality.
Made BCC Calculator accessable from the dump editor.
BCC Calculator updated: The BCC is calculated always over 4 bytes.
Added Help & Info section about the BCC Calculator.

Added devices to the incompatibility and compatibility list.

Incompatible:
* Samsung Galaxy Note 5
* Samsung Galaxy Note 6
* Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Plus
* Samsung Galaxy S7
* Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge

Compatible:
* Sony Xperia M4 Aqua
* Sony Xperia V
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:ikarus23/MifareClassicTool
Fixed typo in compatibility list.

Samsungs Galaxy S5 and S6 Edge are now supported.

reading/writing Mifare Classic tags.
